hanzi-su-wiki:
進

Значения

Идти вперёд; развиваться; двигать вперёд, продвигать

Мнемоника

Птица 隹 способна двигаться 辶 только вперёд.

Варианты

进
purpleculture_pinyin:
jìn
to go forward; to advance; to go in; to enter; to put in; to submit; to take in; to admit; (math.) base of a number system; classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
идти вперед; для продвижения; войти; войти; вставить; представить; взять в; признавать; (математика) основание системы счисления; классификатор участков в здании или жилом комплексе

進進RS

(Simplified: 进)

purpleculture_examples:
進行 [ jìn xíng ]: to advance; to conduct; underway; in progress; to do; to carry out; to carry on; to execute
進入 [ jìn rù ]: to enter; to join; to go into
進一步 [ jìn yī bù ]: one step further; to move forward a step; further onwards
進步 [ jìn bù ]: progress; improvement; to improve; to progress; Classifiers: 个

heisig_chinese_memo: Why did the turkey cross the road? To advance to the other side, of course.
koohiiStory1: Why did the turkey cross the road? To advance to the other side, of course.
koohiiStory2: [re: raulir] Animals on the road: Turtles escape (#283) and Pigs pursue (#539), while the Turkeys advance (looking very formidable indeed).
jp_example_words:
行進(こうしん): march, parade
昇進(しょうしん): promotion
進化(しんか): evolution, progress
進行(しんこう): advance
進出(しんしゅつ): advance, step forward
進呈(しんてい): presentation
進展(しんてん): progress, development
進度(しんど): progress
進路(しんろ): course, route
推進(すいしん): propulsion, driving force
進み(すすみ): progress
増進(ぞうしん): promoting, increase, advance
促進(そくしん): promotion, acceleration, encouragement, facilitation, spurring on
進学(しんがく): going on to university
進歩(しんぽ): progress, development
進む(すすむ): make progress, advance, improve
進める(すすめる): advance, promote, hasten
前進(ぜんしん): advance, drive, progress
jp_readingExamples: 進む (すす.む), 進める (すす.める)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You give your scooter to a turkey so that it can advance. The turkey was trying and failing to walk through a crowded street, so out of the goodness of your heart you gave it a scooter so it could advance.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine picking up the turkey and putting it on your scooter. Of course, you give it your helmet as well, safety first.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You wave as the turkey advances into the street at top speeds, collides with a car, and scrapes up its shins (しん) almost immediately. Ah!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Silly turkey, you can't advance that fast, of course you'll hurt your shins. It's better to advance slowly, but I guess I couldn't expect you to know that.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 推す (お.す、スイ), 進める (すす.む、シン), 堆い (うずたかい、タイ), 准 (ジュン)
Ru_trainchinese: jìn: (глаг) входить; идти вперед; подавать; поступать на службу; получать; (после глагола) указывает на направление действия внутрь
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the little bird (隹) moves (⻌) to advance
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A race car driver ran into a well at the farm race track (road) and couldn't advance in the tournament.
humanum_full_description_en:
" into " original meaning is the way forward, from " short-tailed bird ." In addition to being next to the sound, but also because the birds can not retreat (He Lin reference instrument). The inscriptions on the clan emblem of the Shang Dynasty have the same shape as the oracle bone inscriptions. In the Western Zhou Dynasty, the inscriptions from "辵" and "隹" are used, and the characters " zhi " and "辵" mostly mean walking.

Scholars mostly think that Oracle bone inscriptions mean advancement (Liu Xinglong, Chen Bingxin), Collection 32535: "Jiaxu Bu, Jin, Liao Yuqi (ancestor) B."

Inscriptions on Jinwen means advancement and recommendation, Zhongshan Wang Fanghu: "Promoting the Prosperity", "Zhou Li. Xia Guan. "Da Sima": "Advance to the virtuous and vigorous, in order to become a nation." It also means advancing, Xijia plate: "Into the people", "in the people" means advancing to the service, Tuli (see Guo Moruo, Chen Chusheng) , Referring to Huaiyi's contribution to the Zhou royal family.

Chu Jian expresses progress and progress, "Guodian Chu Jian. "Five Elements": "Publish (for example) and wisdom (knowledge) stomach (predict) advancement" "Shangbo Chu Zhushu IV. "Cao Mo Zhi Chen": "The man (man) 𨟻 (general) army, I am the king, and the way of this battle is obvious."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle starts from "隹" from " stop ", "隹" is like a short-tailed bird, and " stop " is like a foot, meaning that the bird moves forward.
humanum_full_description:
「進」的本義是前進，從「隹」除了作為聲旁之外，還因為鳥不能後退(參何琳儀)。商代族徽金文與甲骨文同形，西周金文皆從「辵」從「隹」，從「止」、「辵」的字多有行走之意。

　　學者多認為甲骨文表示進獻(劉興隆、陳秉新)，《合集》32535：「甲戌卜，進，燎于且(祖)乙。」

　　金文表示進用、舉薦，中山王方壺：「進賢措能」，《周禮．夏官．大司馬》：「進賢興功，以作邦國。」又表示進獻，兮甲盤：「其進人」，「進人」即進獻力役、徒隸(參郭沫若、陳初生)，指淮夷向周王室進獻力役。

　　楚簡表示進步、前進，《郭店楚簡．五行》：「辟(譬)而智(知)之胃(謂)之進之」。《上博楚竹書四．曹沫之陳》：「人吏(使)𨟻(將)軍，我君身進，此戰之顯道」。
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「隹」從「止」，「隹」像短尾鳥，「止」象腳形，會鳥向前進之意。

    • 隹 [ zhuī ] short-tailed bird; sparrow

進入 [ jìn rù ]: to enter; to join; to go into

  • ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking

①向前或向上移動、發展，與“退”相對：前進。上進。推進。躍進。進退。進取。進擊。進駐。進行(xíng)。進而。
②入，往裏去：進見。進謁。進讒。
③喫，喝：進食。進餐。滴水未進。
④收入或買入：進賬。進貨。日進斗金。
⑤奉上，呈上：進言。進奉。進獻。
⑥舊式房院層次，這所宅子是兩進院。
⑦入出退。

「 進 」的本義是前進，從「 隹 」除了作為聲旁之外，還因為鳥不能後退(參何琳儀)。商代族徽金文與甲骨文同形，西周金文皆從「 辵 」從「 隹 」，從「 止 」、「 辵 」的字多有行走之意。 學者多認為甲骨文表示進獻(劉興隆、陳秉新)，《合集》32535：「甲戌卜，進，燎于且(祖)乙。」 金文表示進用、舉薦，中山王方壺：「進賢措能」，《周禮．夏官．大司馬》：「進賢興功，以作邦國。」又表示進獻，兮甲盤：「其進人」，「進人」即進獻力役、徒隸(參郭沫若、陳初生)，指淮夷向周王室進獻力役。 楚簡表示進步、前進，《郭店楚簡．五行》：「辟(譬)而智(知)之胃(謂)之進之」。《上博楚竹書四．曹沫之陳》：「人吏(使)𨟻(將)軍，我君身進，此戰之顯道」。
" into" original meaning is the way forward, from " short-tailed bird." In addition to being next to the sound, but also because the birds can not retreat (He Lin reference instrument). The inscriptions on the clan emblem of the Shang Dynasty have the same shape as the oracle bone inscriptions. In the Western Zhou Dynasty, the inscriptions from " 辵" and " 隹" are used, and the characters " zhi" and " 辵" mostly mean walking. Scholars mostly think that Oracle bone inscriptions mean advancement (Liu Xinglong, Chen Bingxin), Collection 32535: "Jiaxu Bu, Jin, Liao Yuqi (ancestor) B." Inscriptions on Jinwen means advancement and recommendation, Zhongshan Wang Fanghu: "Promoting the Prosperity", "Zhou Li. Xia Guan. "Da Sima": "Advance to the virtuous and vigorous, in order to become a nation." It also means advancing, Xijia plate: "Into the people", "in the people" means advancing to the service, Tuli (see Guo Moruo, Chen Chusheng) , Referring to Huaiyi's contribution to the Zhou royal family. Chu Jian expresses progress and progress, "Guodian Chu Jian. "Five Elements": "Publish (for example) and wisdom (knowledge) stomach (predict) advancement" "Shangbo Chu Zhushu IV. "Cao Mo Zhi Chen": "The man (man) 𨟻 (general) army, I am the king, and the way of this battle is obvious."

進字的基本解释

進
jìn
见“进”。

進字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jìn］
［《廣韻》即刃切，去震，精。］
“进1”的繁体字。
(1)前进；向前。
(2)进仕；出仕。
(3)晋升；提拔。
(4)推荐；引进。
(5)上朝；进见。
(6)进奏；进言。
(7)进奉；奉献。
(8)长进；进展。
(9)推重；褒扬。
(10)增进；加强。
(11)超过。
(12)靠近。
(13)饮；进食。
(14)进入。与“出”相对。
(15)收入；进账。
(16)量词。老式房子一宅之内分前后几排的，一排称为一进。
(17)通“盡”。
(18)通“賮”、“贐”。会礼之财。泛指收入的财礼。
(19)指赌博之资。
(20)通“餕”。谓吃剩下的食物。
(21)通“峻”。高耸。
(22)姓。东汉有进俭。见宋邵思《姓解》卷一。

進字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　進； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1259第30
〔古文〕??【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?卽刃切，音晉。【說文】登也。【玉篇】升也。【廣韻】前也。【禮·曲禮】遭先生于道，趨而進。【表記】君子三揖而進。【註】人之相見，三揖三讓，以升賔階。【書·盤庚】乃登進厥民。【疏】延之使前而告之也。　又【正韻】薦也。【禮·儒行】推賢而進達之。　又【正韻】效也。【禮·樂記】禮減而進，以進爲文。【註】自勉强也。【易·乾卦】君子進德修業，欲及時也。　又近也。【禮·檀弓】兄弟之子猶子也。蓋引而進之也。　又進士。【禮·王制】大樂正論造士之秀者，以告于王，而升諸司馬，曰進士。【註】進士，可進而受爵祿也。　又特進。【後漢·和帝紀】賜諸侯王公將軍特進。【註】諸侯功德優盛，朝廷所敬異者賜位特進。　又與餕同。【禮·祭統】百官進徹之。【註】進同餕。　又【字彙補】與盡同。【列子·黃帝篇】竭聰明，進智力。　又通作薦。【列子·湯問篇】穆王薦之，张註薦當作進。　又【集韻】徐刃切【正韻】齊進切。?與贐同。會禮也。【前漢·高帝紀】蕭何爲

進字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
進字的起名意思

暂无。

Advance
Basic explanation of words
Advance
jìn
See "Into".
Advance
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jìn］
["Guangyun" means cutting with blades, de-shocked, and refined. ]
Traditional characters for "进1".
(1) Forward; forward.
(2) Entering official positions; leaving official positions.
(3) Promotion; promotion.
(4) Recommendation; introduction.
(5) Upgrading; Seeing ahead.
(6) Introductory; Introductory words.
(7) Jin Feng; Dedication.
(8) Growth; progress.
(9) Emphasize; praise.
(10) Improve; strengthen.
(11) Over.
(12) Approaching.
(13) Drink; eat.
(14) Enter. Contrast with "out".
(15) Income; receipts.
(16) Quantifiers. Old-fashioned houses are divided into front and back rows within one house, and one row is called one entry.
(17) Through "Exhaustion".
(18) Through "賮" and "赆". The gift of wealth. Refers to the financial gift of income in general.
(19) Refers to gambling resources.
(20) Link "餕". That is to eat leftover food.
(21) Through "Jun". Towering.
(22) Last name. There is advancement and thrift in the Eastern Han Dynasty. See Volume One of Song Shaosi's "Surname Solution".

[Sparse] Yan Zhizhi came forward and told it.　[Zheng Yun] Recommend also. 【Rite·Confucianism】Promote talents and advance them.　 [Zheng Yun] The effect is also. 【Li·Le Ji】Li reduces and advances, with advance as the writing. Advance
Name meaning
Nothing.
jìn
вм. 进
Radicals: 隹  (turkey, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
You give your scooter to a turkey so that it can advance. The turkey was trying and failing to walk through a crowded street, so out of the goodness of your heart you gave it a scooter so it could advance.
Imagine picking up the turkey and putting it on your scooter. Of course, you give it your helmet as well, safety first.
Reading Mnemonic
You wave as the turkey advances into the street at top speeds, collides with a car, and scrapes up its shins (しん) almost immediately. Ah!
Silly turkey, you can't advance that fast, of course you'll hurt your shins. It's better to advance slowly, but I guess I couldn't expect you to know that.
